-'s.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a short form of ‘us’ used only in ‘let’s’
-'s.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a short form of ‘does’, used in questions after ‘who’, ‘what’ etc that many people think is incorrect
-'s.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: How’s he plan to do that?
-'s.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: forms the possessive of singular nouns, and of plural nouns that do not end in -s
-'s.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: the shop or home of someone
-'s.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: I bought it at the baker’s  (=at the baker’s shop).
I met him at Mary’s  (=at Mary’s house).
